movies.title: The Castle of Cagliostro
movies.plot: Reknowned international thief Lupin III (known as "Wolf" in the English dub) comes to the small European duchy of Cagliostro to investigate some excellently-forged money and stumbles across a national conspiracy going back some hundreds of years. Lupin and his friends must rescue the beautiful Clarice from the hands of the evil Count Cagliostro and solve the mystery of a hidden treasure dating back to the 15th century.
movies.simplePlot: A flamboyant thief and his gang struggle to free a princess from an evil count's clutches and to learn the hidden secret to a fabulous treasure that she holds part of a key to.

biography.bio: Yasuo Yamada was born on September 10, 1932 in Tokyo, Japan. He was an actor, known for The Castle of Cagliostro (1979), Lupin the 3rd (1977) and Lupin the 3rd: The Mystery of Mamo (1978). He died on March 19, 1995 in Japan.
biography.name: Yasuo Yamada

biography.bio: Eiko Masuyama was born on April 22, 1936 in Tokyo, Japan as Tomoko Masada. She is an actress, known for The Castle of Cagliostro (1979), Chappie, the Witch (1972) and Cherry miel (1973).
biography.name: Eiko Masuyama

biography.bio: Kiyoshi Kobayashi was born on January 11, 1933 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for The Castle of Cagliostro (1979), Lupin the 3rd (1977) and Daitokai - Tatakai no hibi (1976).
biography.name: Kiyoshi Kobayashi

biography.bio: Makio Inoue was born on November 30, 1940 in Yamanashi, Japan as Takao Inoue. He is an actor, known for The Castle of Cagliostro (1979), Lupin the 3rd (1977) and Arcadia of My Youth (1982).
biography.name: Makio Inoue

biography.bio: Gorô Naya was born on November 17, 1929 in Hakodate, Hokkaido, Japan. He was an actor, known for Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind (1984), The Castle of Cagliostro (1979) and Lupin the 3rd (1977). He was married to Kachiko Hino. He died on March 5, 2013 in Chiba, Chiba, Japan.
biography.name: Gorô Naya

biography.bio: Sumi Shimamoto was born on December 8, 1954 in Kochi, Japan. She is an actress, known for Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind (1984), The Castle of Cagliostro (1979) and Princesse Sarah (1985). She is married to Daisuke Koshikawa.
biography.name: Sumi Shimamoto

biography.bio: Tarô Ishida was born on March 16, 1944 in Kyoto, Japan as Gentarô Ishida. He was an actor, known for Metropolis (2001), Departures (2008) and Akira (1988). He died on September 21, 2013 in Sagamihara, Kanagawa, Japan.
biography.name: Tarô Ishida

biography.bio: Kôhei Miyauchi was born on August 4, 1929 in Kagoshima, Japan as Takayuki Miyauchi. He was an actor, known for Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind (1984), Dragon Ball Z (1989) and The Castle of Cagliostro (1979). He died on June 2, 1995.
biography.name: Kôhei Miyauchi

biography.bio: Ichirô Nagai was born on May 10, 1931 in Osaka, Japan. He was an actor, known for Lamu (1981), Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind (1984) and Ninja Scroll (1993). He was married to Ayako. He died on January 27, 2014 in Hiroshima, Japan.
biography.name: Ichirô Nagai

biography.bio: Tadamichi Tsuneizumi is an actor, known for The Castle of Cagliostro (1979), Tsumiki kuzushi - oya to ko no 200 nichi sensô (1983) and Kaze no rondo (1995).
biography.name: Tadamichi Tsuneizumi

biography.bio: Kinpei Azusa was born on May 1, 1931. He was an actor, known for The Castle of Cagliostro (1979), Dragon Ball Z: Bardock - The Father of Goku (1990) and Dragon Ball Z: The Return of Cooler (1992). He died on May 24, 1997.
biography.name: Kinpei Azusa

biography.bio: Shôzô Hirabayashi was born on August 23, 1937 in Gifu, Japan. He was an actor, known for The Castle of Cagliostro (1979), Hachi-ko (1987) and Locke the Superman (1984). He died on October 3, 2004.
biography.name: Shôzô Hirabayashi

biography.bio: Mikio Terashima was born on September 4, 1931 in Fukui, Japan. He was an actor, known for Gatchaman (1972), The Castle of Cagliostro (1979) and Hinin kakumei (1967). He was married to Yasuko Terashima. He died on December 4, 2008 in Tokorozawa, Saitama, Japan.
biography.name: Mikio Terashima

biography.bio: Akio Nojima was born on April 6, 1945 in Tokyo, Japan. He is known for his work on The Castle of Cagliostro (1979), Vanessa et la magie des rêves (1984) and Time of Eve (2010).
biography.name: Akio Nojima

biography.bio: Minoru Midorikawa was born on March 5, 1932 in Tokyo, Japan. He was an actor, known for The Castle of Cagliostro (1979), Honeybee Hutch (1970) and Mobile Suit Gundam I (1981). He died on September 30, 1985.
biography.name: Minoru Midorikawa

awards.award: Academy of Science Fiction, Fantasy & Horror Films, USA 1981
